author: CBC News
title: Nearly 6 million people have applied for COVID-19 emergency benefits
description: Nearly six million people have applied for COVID-19 emergency aid benefits in the past month.
content:
Nearly six million people have applied for COVID-19 emergency aid benefits in the past month.
Figures from Employment Minister Carla Qualtrough's office show that more than half of them (3.5 million) have applied for the Canada emergency response benefit (CE… [+1046 chars]
